summary: This is an internal FBI email from November 4, 2020, in which Squad C-20 requests assistance from two agents for the Ghislaine Maxwell investigation. The agents are needed to show digital discovery evidence to Maxwell and her defense team at the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) on November 6, 2020.

persons.name: Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the investigation; digital evidence is to be shown to her and her defense team at MDC.

events.title: Scheduled Discovery Review at MDC
events.description: Two FBI agents are requested to show digital discovery evidence to Ghislaine Maxwell and her defense team at the Metropolitan Detention Center.

keyFacts: The FBI's Squad C-20 was actively investigating Ghislaine Maxwell as of November 2020.
The investigation involved digital evidence that required presentation to the defendant and her legal team.
A specific logistical request was made for two agents to assist with this evidence presentation on November 6, 2020.
